CRAFT.TITLE: Fachkompetenz
CRAFT.DESCRIPTION: Tiefgreifende Expertise in modernen Technologien und Entwicklungspraktiken
CRAFT.DESCRIPTION_LONG: Tauchen Sie ein in die Grundpfeiler meines Handwerks - die Methoden und Praktiken, die ich befolge. In diesem Abschnitt entdecken Sie nicht nur die Dienstleistungen, die ich anbiete, sondern auch den philosophischen Ansatz, den ich verfolge. Von der Priorisierung direkter Kommunikation mit Kunden bis zur Sicherstellung zukunftssicherer Softwaregestaltung verbinde ich Fachwissen mit Empathie und sorge dafür, dass jedes Projekt ein maßgeschneidertes Meisterwerk ist.

client.TITLE: Client-Centric Rapid Development
client.DESCRIPTION: In today’s fast-paced world, understanding client requirements and adapting quickly is key. I prioritize direct communication and iterative development. This means less time deciphering needs and more time building solutions tailored to you.
client.TOOLS: Real-time collaboration tools (e.g., Slack, Trello) for keeping clients in the loop.

technical.TITLE: Comprehensive Technical Services
technical.DESCRIPTION: Whether it's crafting pixel-perfect frontends, robust backends, streamlining CI/CD pipelines, or providing expert consultancy, I offer a comprehensive suite of services. Let's make your vision a reality, from concept to deployment.
technical.TOOLS: Frontend (React, Vue, SASS), Backend (Node.js, Express, MongoDB), CI/CD (Jenkins, GitHub Actions), and Consultation sessions via Zoom or Teams.

aws.TITLE: Architectural Excellence with Cloud Expertise
aws.DESCRIPTION: With a certified proficiency in AWS, I pride myself on designing resilient, scalable, and efficient software architectures. From designing robust microservices to leveraging cloud-native solutions, I ensure your software not only meets current demands but is future-proof.
aws.TOOLS: AWS (Lambda, EC2, S3, etc.), Docker, Serverless Framework, Terraform.

codequality.TITLE: Holistic Code Quality
codequality.DESCRIPTION: Beyond just "working" code, I focus on clarity, maintainability, and anticipating unseen edge cases. While Test-Driven Development (TDD) is valuable, I emphasize holistic code quality—ensuring each line is purposeful, tested, and contributes to the larger software vision.

CONTACT.TITLE: Kontakt
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION_LONG: Haben Sie eine Idee, eine Frage oder möchten Sie einfach nur Hallo sagen? Dies ist Ihr Portal, um direkt mit mir in Kontakt zu treten. Sei es für Projektbesprechungen, technische Beratungen oder einfach nur etwas Technik-Geplauder, meine virtuelle Tür steht immer offen und wartet darauf, Verbindungen und Kollaborationen zu fördern.

FEATS.TITLE: Erfolge
FEATS.DESCRIPTION_LONG: Betreten Sie eine Galerie meiner beruflichen Errungenschaften. Hier finden Sie eine sorgfältig ausgewählte Sammlung von Projekten aus verschiedenen Bereichen und Herausforderungen. Jedes Unterfangen erzählt eine Geschichte von Hingabe, Können und dem unermüdlichen Streben nach Exzellenz und vermittelt einen Eindruck davon, was ich zu bieten habe.
FEATS.DESCRIPTION: Ausgewählte Erfolge, die meine Problemlösungsfähigkeiten und Hingabe unterstreichen

FEATS.TITLE: 'The Foundation of My Expertise'
FEATS.DESCRIPTION: My journey at CARIAD was marked by a deep dive into the vast expanse of web technologies, where I was entrusted with the pivotal role of dispatching software to a multitude of vehicles worldwide.

SLIDES.TITLE: SDK Maintainer
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: In my tenure at CARIAD, my team and I owned the stewardship of an expansive SDK comprising a variety of libraries, specialized build tools, dynamic applications, cutting-edge documentation, and consistent support mechanisms to aid other teams in the software ecosystem.

SLIDES.TITLE: Libraries
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: Spearheaded the creation and management of diverse libraries. This spectrum included white-labelled UI libraries offering thematic dynamism, custom communication protocols, and high-level abstractions for specialized car functions.

SLIDES.TITLE: Build Tools
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: Championed the development of enhanced extensions to the Angular CLI, fine-tuned explicitly for the idiosyncrasies of the infotainment system environment.

SLIDES.TITLE: Applications
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: Delivered a comprehensive suite of desktop applications, equipped with monitoring, debugging, analyzing, and testing capabilities, ensuring a smooth development and integration process.

SLIDES.TITLE: Extensive Documentation
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: Pioneered an advanced documentation paradigm, with features such as auto-generation and auto-deployment, underpinned by our tailored CD/CI pipeline, ensuring seamless access and updates for developers.

SLIDES.TITLE: Support for Other Teams
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: Established a centralized expertise hub, providing consistent support to various in-house teams and third-party collaborators. From workshops to debugging sessions and email support, we ensured a holistic environment for knowledge sharing and problem-solving.

FEATS.TITLE: 'Shaping the Next Tech Vanguard'
FEATS.DESCRIPTION: Blending a psychological insight with technical expertise, I've ventured beyond coding. I've served as both a guide for teams and a mentor for future tech leaders, ensuring they're industry-ready with a human touch.

SLIDES.TITLE: Benjamin Dobler
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: "I've had the privilege of sharing both workstations and laughs with Zartin. Beyond being a tech genius, they've always been the human touchpoint in every project. Genuine, heartfelt, and a rock in times of chaos. I didn't just find a colleague; I found a friend."

SLIDES.TITLE: Thomas Volk
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: "Navigating complex projects becomes tenfold easier with Zartin on your side. His unwavering commitment, keen insights, and relentless problem-solving made the impossible possible. I owe a lion's share of our project's success to him."

SLIDES.TITLE: Vladyslav Tsurkanenko
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: "Learning from Martin wasn't just about code or tech—it was about understanding, compassion, and real connection. Their dedication wasn't limited to the syllabus; they genuinely cared about each of us, ensuring we didn't just learn, but thrived."

FEATS.TITLE: 'Revamping Spiced Academy's Digital Presence'
FEATS.DESCRIPTION: I undertook a complete transformation of Spiced Academy's digital presence, emphasizing my dedication to superior design, functionality, and user experience. The platform's adaptability and consistency set new standards.

SLIDES.TITLE: Technical Modernization
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: Transitioning from legacy tech stacks requires thorough analysis, risk mitigation, and strategic implementation. Successfully migrating from Handlebars and JQuery to a modern ensemble of NextJS, Tailwind, and GraphQL established a robust platform conducive for advanced functionalities and future scalability.

SLIDES.TITLE: Content Management Evolution
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: To enhance the academy's content agility and adaptability, I integrated a CMS. This empowers content administrators to dynamically adjust and update site content, fostering a consistent and updated user experience without any dependency on development cycles.

SLIDES.TITLE: Responsive & Scalable Design Implementation
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: Implemented a sleek responsive design that delivers a consistent user experience on all devices. This design was crafted with developers in mind, allowing for streamlined scalability and effortless future enhancements.

SLIDES.TITLE: Performance and SEO Optimization
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: A primary metric of a website's success is its performance and visibility. Post overhaul, meticulous optimization strategies were employed, leading to improved site responsiveness and SEO metrics. This ensures that Spiced Academy is optimally positioned in search engine rankings, driving organic traffic and enhancing user engagement.

SLIDES.TITLE: Enhanced Developer Experience
SLIDES.DESCRIPTION: Anticipating future developmental needs, the overhaul focused on enhancing the developer experience. This involved refining the coding environment, meticulous documentation, and establishing streamlined workflows, facilitating seamless future developments and feature integrations.

JOURNEY.TITLE: Laufbahn
JOURNEY.DESCRIPTION_LONG: Durchqueren Sie die Zeitleiste meines beruflichen Lebens. Von bescheidenen Anfängen bis zu bedeutenden Meilensteinen erleben Sie die Entwicklung eines Codierers, der zum Technikexperten wurde. Dieser Abschnitt gibt Einblick in die Erfahrungen, Herausforderungen und Erkenntnisse, die meine Reise in der sich ständig weiterentwickelnden Techniklandschaft geprägt haben.
JOURNEY.DESCRIPTION: Eine berufliche Laufbahn, die sich durch kontinuierliches Lernen und Anpassungsfähigkeit auszeichnet
